issue.title: notification is sent to extraction manager for 'auto' product mining
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Notification is sent to extraction manager for 'auto' product mining, it wasn't in V2.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Also fixed : when multiple extraction managers are set, only one is notified
rev. 9264
